question: You hit a shot and you find that ball rolled past a white out-of-bounds (OB) post. What should you do?*

choices.text: Play the ball as it lies without any penalty.
Move the ball one club-length from the OB post.
Add a one-shot penalty, and walk back and hit another ball from where your last shot was played from
Pull the post out of the ground and hit your ball

explanation: You are out-of-bounds. You are not allowed to play that ball, so you will need to pick it up and go back to where you last hit it and add 1 penalty shot to your score.
